articles.author: Gerry Shih, Lena Sun
articles.title: China identifies new strain of coronavirus as source of pneumonia outbreak
articles.description: Dozens have people have been sickened in recent weeks in a spate of cases that originated in the city of Wuhan.
articles.content:
A group of Chinese experts this week isolated and obtained the genome sequence of the new virus, which is believed to be responsible for sickening dozens who visited a wild animal market last month in Wuhan, central China, state media reported Thursday.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Report: Road accident in Iran kills 19 people, injures 24
articles.description: An Iranian news agency says 19 people were killed and 24 were injured in a road accident in the country's north
articles.content:
ISNA said the accident was caused by a technical failure in the brakes of the bus.
Iran has one of the worlds worst traffic safety records, with some 17,000 annual deaths in road accidents. The grave toll is blamed on wide disregard for traffic laws, unsafe … [+176 chars]

articles.author: Amir Vahdat and Jon Gambrell | AP
articles.title: Iran investigators: Crashed jetliner never called for help
articles.description: Iranian investigators say the crew of the Ukrainian jetliner that crashed outside Tehran the previous day never made a radio call for help and were trying to turn back to the airport when the plane went down
articles.content:
The investigators also said that the plane was engulfed in fire before it crashed. They said the crash caused a massive explosion when the plane hit the ground, likely because the aircraft had been fully loaded with fuel for the flight to Kyiv, Ukraine.
